author: NJManganelli
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds to the README in the L1Trigger/L1TTrackMatch significant documentation about the Global Track Trigger code in CMSSW (including cross-references to Firmware where appropriate), much of which was previously not documented anywhere or not so centrally.

#### PR validation:

This PR only modifies a README and thus no code validation is run

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

No backports will be needed
title: Phase 2 L1Trigger GTT subsystem docs
